entry.title: help our frens @SpruceID improve Sign-in with Ethereum by dropping some feedback in the form below. they're doing the lords work for the ecosystem �...
entry.summary: help our frens @SpruceID improve Sign-in with Ethereum by dropping some feedback in the form below. they're doing the lords work for the ecosystem 🤝 no PII required, just a few mins of your time Spruce: We're conducting general research on how developers build dapps - specifically to learn more about how we can best support Sign-In with Ethereum development. If you are a developer and have 3-5 minutes - we'd love to hear your feedback: https://forms.gle/L8jpMjVtVBk4i5HV8

entry.title: This kicking off now - go check out the awesome work the @ddschoolofcode team are doing for free open education 👑
entry.summary: This kicking off now - go check out the awesome work the @ddschoolofcode team are doing for free open education 👑 D_D School Of Code: Join us with @IamVickjoe to discuss the future of web3 education, community and public goods on July 20th at 5 PM UTC 🗓 We will be dropping some alpha for folks tuning in to this so hope to see y’all there 👀 https://m.twitch.tv/githubeducation/schedule
